text: is a former Japanese football player. She played for the Japan national team. ==Biography== Suzuki was born in Kanagawa Prefecture on January 26, 1982. After graduating from Shonan Women's High School, she joined Tasaki Perule FC in 2000. She played 117 matches for the club until 2007. She moved to INAC Leonessa (later INAC Kobe Leonessa) in 2008. She retired in 2009. On January 12, 2003, Suzuki debuted for the Japan national team against United States. She played 3 games and scored 2 goals for Japan until 2005. ==Statistics== Japan Football Association Japan national team Year Apps Goals 2003 2 2 2004 0 0 2005 1 0 Total 3 2 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Kanagawa Prefecture Category:Japan women's international footballers Category:Nadeshiko League players Category:Tasaki Perule FC players Category:INAC Kobe Leonessa players
title: Tomoko Suzuki
